short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share the current page via Telegram messenger in just one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to share any webpage, youtube video etc. to your Telegram contacts with one click!
Works with Telegram Desktop and Telegram Web!
